main event: Multiple witnesses reported seeing round objects in various colors over Atlanta, GA on August 2, 1952, with descriptions ranging from red and orange to yellow.
interesting points: Witnesses estimated the objects were flying at 132 mph, varying distances were reported from witnesses, Reports mentioned that the objects emitted very bright lights, Observations included at least two small aircraft flying in loose formation around the same time, multiple calls confirmed similar sightings over a short duration.
sighted object: round objects with colors red, orange, and yellow
witness description: including an aircraft mechanic and civilians seeing bright lights in the sky
